Name: San Lok
Review Text: First they are overrated.  Poor customer service!! Absolutely not the best Chinese food! No forks no napkins!!!!

Name: San Lok
Review Text: Awesome! Best Chinese take out in the city. The wonton soup is amazing!

Name: San Lok
Review Text: Place doesn't look as good as their food. Long-standing family run business. Chicken wings seasoned perfectly u don't need to add extra seasonings. I absolutely love their shrimp and chicken fried rice with gravy!!!!! their food rice is authentic Chinese fried rice.

Name: San Lok
Review Text: San Lok doesn‚Äôt look pretty from the outside, but the food is ALWAYS delicious and the portions are huge. there is always something different included in your standard dishes. i love lo mein but it usually tastes the same everywhere. here they do something different and add more veggies and it always hits the spot!

Name: San Lok
Review Text: This place has been around for many, many years. Family owned I'm sure... I moved away, haven't been in over 15 years. Happen to be in the area so we stopped by. It didn't disappoint. Food is consistently GOOD! Not in the best neighborhood but it's right across from a police station.

Name: San Lok
Review Text: They have these broccoli shrimp rolls with cheese inside. There great..  Cheese Steak rolls great also... Great food period... Best hood chinese store around 40 years strong...

Name: San Lok
Review Text: I travel for work & have ordered Chinese all over the country. This is the second time I've had China House, the first time I spent $40 they threw in a Free General Tso's Chicken & this time spent $30 I received Free Crab Rangoons. ‚Ä¶

Name: San Lok
Review Text: I love the lo-mein, Egg Fo Young, Shrimp Fried Rice, always fresh tasting the favor is better than most restaurants of its kind

Name: San Lok
Review Text: Don't let the looks from the outside, or the guys hanging out in front (They live around there) fool you. The food is awesome. And great prices. They take time to prepare your food. Great food

Name: San Lok
Review Text: Stop in to SAN LOK! Great neighborhood Chinese spot. Like everyone says, don't judge this book by its cover! Best General Tsos! And the drinks in soup containers are delicious!

Name: San Lok
Review Text: This is a local business in Point Breeze.  They serve large portions for a reasonable price.
